name: ai.cerb.automationBuilder.autocomplete.d3TimeFormat
script:
start:
  
  await:
    form:
      title: Date Format
      elements:
        sheet/prompt_date_format:
          label: Choose:
          required@bool: yes
          data:
            0:
              format: %Y
              output: {{'now'|date('Y')}}
            1:
              format: %Y-%m
              output: {{'now'|date('Y-m')}}
            2:
              format: %Y-%m-%d
              output: {{'now'|date('Y-m-d')}}
            3:
              format: %Y-%m-%d %H:%M
              output: {{'now'|date('Y-m-d H:i')}}
            4:
              format: %Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S
              output: {{'now'|date('Y-m-d H:i:s')}}
            5:
              format: %B '%y
              output: {{'now'|date("F 'y")}}
            6:
              format: %b '%y
              output: {{'now'|date("M 'y")}}
          limit: 30
          default: %Y-%m-%d
          schema:
            layout:
              headings@bool: no
              paging@bool: no
              style: grid
            columns:
              selection/format:
                params:
                  mode: single
              text/output:
        submit:
          continue@bool: no
          reset@bool: no

  return:
    snippet@key: prompt_date_format
policy_kata:
commands:
  # [TODO] Specify a command policy here (use Ctrl+Space for autocompletion)
